title: Area of structures for water, grey water, wet-waste or an effluent treatment plant, rain water harvesting Pump rooms, (1) (--) electric cabin of sub-stations / of generator set area, electric meter rooms as per requirements, Refuge chutes / garbage chutes /garbage shafts for wet and dry garbage separately with collection chambers

section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
